error.nothing_enabled: None of the contracts have been selected to be added to the system.
error.contracts_missing: The user has no contracts to add.
error.partial_offline:
Mosoblgaz service has been suspended for temporary technical work.
Please try to set up later.
error.api_error: An error occurred while exchanging data with the Mosoblgaz API. Error data is available in the log.

without_captcha.description: Enter your login details for your Mosoblgaz account. By default, all accounts linked to your user will be added.
without_captcha.title: Mosoblgaz Login

with_captcha.description:
Enter your login details for your Mosoblgaz account. By default, all accounts linked to your user will be added.

Populate the CAPTCHA text field with the text displayed on the image below:
![{captcha_token}]({captcha_url})
_Hint: Leave the field empty to refresh captcha._
with_captcha.title: Mosoblgaz Login

contract.description:
Choose options for contract no. {{ code }}.
Disabling contract option will completely disable the contract!
contract.title: Contract no. {{ code }}

data.timeout: Timeout of requests to the server (in seconds)

import.description:
*Settings via the interface are not available when configuring via YAML.*

Please edit the configuration file to change the parameters.
